title: New: BANKS – Waiting Game (Produced by SOHN)
body:
Photo via [Hunger Magazine](http://www.hungertv.com/feature/the-interview-banks/)

Rising star **BANKS** has a knack for getting the hottest producers on board, and new track _Waiting Game_ is no different, finding her teaming up with CitR favourite **SOHN**. With the deep, rolling synth sections, and sampled vocals that dominate much of **SOHN’s** own work, it’s far and away her finest track to date. It’s bold, delicately poignant, and effortlessly slick. A host of tour dates coming up with The Weeknd, and rumours of numerous other collaborations in the works, _Waiting Game_ is just the start of a very exciting few months for **BANKS**.
